front.title: IPsec secured GRE tunnel demultiplexing problem statement

abstract.t: This document describes the IPsec secured GRE based VPNdemultiplexing problem statement. When two or more IPsec SAs areused to protect GRE encapsulated VPN network between the same pair ofedge router, the current GRE based VPN does not support the edgerouter to demultiplex data for different IPsec SA. GRE key providesone solution to demultiplex the VPNs secured by IPsec.
